item.title: Anti-Collision Lights (Red Strobes/White Strobes) – Upper and Lower Red Fuselage Strobe Lights

remarks.para: Upper and lower red fuselage strobe lights may be inoperative provided wing tip white strobe lights are operative.

placard.para: Placard next to Anti-Collision and Landing lights on control panel M56 denoting light(s) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
